name: Muhammad Zidaan Falih Ilmi-Electronical Engineering Technology Student
description: I am a student from Semarang State Polytechnic, majoring in electrical engineering. I am an expert in repair and troubleshooting. I have interned at large companies such as Sanken Electronics and Samsung Electronics as a technician. In addition, I am also interested in the field of microcontrollers such as Arduino Uno, ESP, and Raspberry Pi. I also understand coding languages ​​such as Python, C and C++.
